scripts.rinkeby-deploy: cd rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ erasureprotocol/rinkeby-v130
scripts.kovan-deploy: cd kovan && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ erasureprotocol/kovan-v130
scripts.mainnet-deploy: cd mainnet graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ erasureprotocol/v13
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 erasureprotocol/v130 kovan/subgraph.yaml
